{"id":522476110,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 5 months","timestamp":1626274351,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/522476110/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Regular Expression Matching","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n        int m=s.size();\n        int n=p.size();\n        bool dp[m+1][n+1];\n        dp[0][0]=true;\n        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)\n        {\n            if(p[i-1]=='*')\n            {\n                return dp[0][i-2];\n            }\n        }\n        for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)\n        {\n            for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)\n            {\n                if(s[i-1]==p[j-1] || p[j-1]=='.')\n                    dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1];\n                else if(p[j-1]=='*')\n                {\n                    dp[i][j]=dp[i][j-2];\n                    if(s[i-1]==p[j-2] || p[j-2]=='.')\n                        dp[i][j]?dp[i][j]:dp[i-1][j];\n                }\n                else\n                {\n                    dp[i][j]=false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[m][n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"regular-expression-matching","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
